markdownRemark.html:
I’ve many ideas about how to reinvent and refine myself, unfortunately, also have massive confusion in my head, when something happens, ideas can’t come out to help me automatically, then other people grasp this opportunity to speak for himself, I loose the chance, even more, it lets me down, that is very bad to me. A voice always tells me ‘Take the lead, toot your own horn, boy!‘.

I write this article just to tell myself to toot my own horn, speak for myself, point out the importance.

Why need to toot your own horn?

  • Wrong idea 1, my work will speaks for myself, all the time, I believe if you get the work done well, then boss and collogues will recognize my hard work and reward me, too badly, this is just my own mind, everyone is very busy, has work to deal with, who has time to care about what you do? or why they are responsible for speaking for you?
  • Wrong idea 2, this work or project don’t have much matter with me, I don’t want to say any word or do anything, this is definitely bad for my career, it makes me do the jobs in my own scope, can not make influence outside my group or organization, it makes me feel like a outsider in the meeting.

How to make a difference ?

  • Promote myself and work, take the initiative to speak for myself, write down some accomplishment that most people don’t know, don’t by shy, tell the behind story, make them impressed. Showcase what I do and how I do it in a convince and confident tone. In some cases, I must bragg about something in a strategic way.
  • Take the lead, lead yourself, change my mind about the meeting, even if I know it doesn’t have much matter with me, must be curious about what they are talking about, and think about it, then you can engaged into the meeting, don’t make myself be an outsider.I can share what I know anything about the topic, I can help others to improve their ideas. Finally, listening carefully will learn something new, have more contact with others.

I know these very great suggestions, but when the problem happens, I couldn’t take any action to rescue myself. I don’t have the related thoughts about the topic, so can not figure out where is the problem what I can do, I just in the meeting without any word from the beginning to the end.

What I need to do firstly is to compel myself to be prepared and ready to ask questions, use critical thinking in the meeting, don’t be lazy and sloppy in mind.

Keep concentrate on the topic, then I can toot my own horn in one day.
